title: Dangerous Affair
description: The second erotic novella of Driftwood Cove.On the run to avoid arrest and exposure, Linda St. John sails to find protection within the arms of the only man she believes she can still trust: her first love. Their journey began with the optimism of youth, but now as the arm of a major drug cartel, Derek could be a gamble far greater than Linda is prepared for. An adventure of disciplined exploration, Dangerous Affair tests the limits of Linda's control in a deadly game of cat and mouse.
author: E.C. Towers
